Description: Green glazed composition shabti of general Ankhwahibrasaneit born of Astakhbit with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard and crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in eight rows of incised Hieroglyphs; the back-pillar is also inscribed with incised Hieroglyphs; there is a plinth beneath the foot.
